sentence.Network_en: You must be! Running us all out of business, they say. Balderdash!
sentence.Network_cn: 一定是! 他们说尽力做好我们的生意. 胡扯!

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a frothy liquid; later, an unappetizing mixture of drinks): of unknown origin

entry.def: If you say that something that has been said or written is balderdash, you think it is completely untrue or very stupid.

auth_sentence.content: But based on the actual statistics, this is complete balderdash.
auth_sentence.res_content: But based on the actual statistics, this is complete balderdash.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But based on the actual statistics, this is complete balderdash.

auth_sentence.content: Cigarettes are still being sold, but at least we're not getting such balderdash from this quarter any more.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cigarettes are still being sold, but at least we're not getting such balderdash from this quarter any more.

auth_sentence.content: We had a number of bootleg games some weird Mickey Mouse tower game and Balderdash.
